    public class Translator
extends Message
    Translator decorator for Message Objects.

    Klaus Ableitinger

      • setMessage

        public void setMessage(Message message)
        Sets the Message this Translator should decorate.

      • addTranslations

        public void addTranslations(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> translations)
        Adds a map of translation to this Translator. Every key in the map will be replaced by its corresponding value.
        Parameters:
        translations - the translations to add

      • addTranslation

        public void addTranslation(java.lang.String from,
                           java.lang.String to)
        Adds a single Translation to this translator.
        Parameters:
        from - the String to translate from
        to - the String to translate to

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Returns the text returned by the defined message, with all words translated.

        Returns:
